foreignData.name: Schicksalsweber
foreignData.text:
Reichweite
Seelengebunden
Solange der Schicksalsweber an eine andere Kreatur gebunden ist, haben beide Kreaturen „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, ziehe so viele Karten, wie ihre Stärke beträgt."

foreignData.name: Tisseuse de destin
foreignData.text:
Portée
Association d'âmes
Tant que la Tisseuse de destin est associée à une autre créature, chacune de ces créatures a « Quand cette créature meurt, piochez un nombre de cartes égal à sa force. »

foreignData.name: 破滅の織り手
foreignData.text:
到達
結魂
破滅の織り手がこれでないクリーチャーと組になっているかぎり、それらのクリーチャーは「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、これのパワーの値に等しい枚数のカードを引く。」を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 蜘蛛・ホラー

name: Doom Weaver
originalText:
Reach
Soulbond
As long as Doom Weaver is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, draw cards equal to its power."

rulings.text: Use the creature's power as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how many cards to draw.

text:
Reach
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Doom Weaver is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, draw cards equal to its power."
